text: So the next day, wishing to know for certain why Paul was being accused by the Jews, the commander released him 22:30 from his bonds 87.7% ¦ --- CT 9.8%from his bonds and commanded the chief priests and 22:30 their ¦ the CTtheir entire Sanhedrin to 22:30 come ¦ assemble CTcome. Then he brought Paul down and had him stand before them.
